value:
$WmMPID_デジェル,ch04_38_Degel_F_Normal,Face|I must become stronger. Some day,
I will take back everything I lost.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Wait, Líf!$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|What is it?$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|You... You know something about me,
don't you? Tell me. Please, tell me.$k$p$EFace_Pain|I'm close...so close...to remembering
something. Something important...$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|*sigh*$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|The flowers you placed in that town...
They were an offering, weren't they?$k$pIt all feels so familiar...$k$p$EFace_Pain|I... Yes...$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|Tell Hel. She'll erase those memories.
She'll erase them all...$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|And yet, as you say that, your face is
so sad. Why?$k$pYou... Could it be?$k$p$Sbs150|
